messages.content: ComfyUI-SunoAI is a ComfyUI node that wraps the Suno API, allowing users to generate images using the Suno AI model.
What are the two nodes available in ComfyUI-SunoAI?
The two nodes available in ComfyUI-SunoAI are SunoAIGenerator and SunoAIGeneratorNotSafe.
How does the SunoAIGenerator node read the suno cookie?
The SunoAIGenerator node reads the suno cookie from the local .env file.
No, the SunoAIGeneratorNotSafe node is not secure as it reads the suno cookie into the node in real time.
The Suno API is an unofficial Python library for the Suno AI API, which allows users to generate images using the Suno AI model.
Is there a plan to create a ComfyUI node for udio?
Yes, there is a todo item to create a ComfyUI node for udio, which is currently a work in progress (WIP).
Has the request address for Suno AI been modified?
Yes, the request address for Suno AI has been corrected and some methods have been modified.
